edu.upc.BDAccessRemot.j2meApi
Class MobileHTTPStatementResult

java.lang.Object
  edu.upc.BDAccessRemot.j2meApi.MobileHTTPStatementResult

public class MobileHTTPStatementResult
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the result of a SQL statement. It could be a select result, a write result or an error result. The status atribute will tell if the result is not ready, ready or ready but an error. If the statement is a select it is possible to create a J2ME table called SDLIB_temp_table that contains a materialized view of the result of the statement.

MobileHTTPStatementResult

Constructs a new instance of MobileHTTPStatementResult with the specified SQL statement. By default, the status of this MobileHTTPStatementResult is WAITING.

getStringResult

public java.lang.String[][] getStringResult()
If this MobileHTTPStatementResult instance is a result, returns the result in a string matrix format. If it is not a select, returns an empty string matrix of 1 row and 1 column.

Returns:
The result of this MobileHTTPStatementResult instance in a string matrix format.

getColumnNames

public java.lang.String[] getColumnNames()
If this MobileHTTPStatementResult instance is a select, returns a vector with the column names. If it is not, an empty vector od 1 position.

Returns:
A vector with the column names of this MobileHTTPStatementResult instance.

getColumnTypes

public java.lang.String[] getColumnTypes()
If this MobileHTTPStatementResult instance is a select, returns a vector with the column types. If it is not, returns an empty vector of 1 position.

Returns:
A vector with the column types of this MobileHTTPStatementResult instance.

getColumnLength

public int[] getColumnLength()
If this MobileHTTPStatementResult instance is a select, returns a vector with the column length of each column. If it is not, returns an empty vector of 1 position.

Returns:
A vector with the column length of each length of this MobileHTTPStatementResult instance.

generateJ2METable

public void generateJ2METable()
                       throws J2MEDBException
Generates a J2METable called SDLIB_temp_table that contains a materialized view of the result of the statement.

Throws:
J2MEDBException - Thrown if there's a problem creating the J2METable
